products.title: Origin (Blackout), Crimson - Vertical Blind
products.description: The sleek and pliable origin (blackout) in crimson a gorgeously brave red, on a hardwearing blackout fabric. Its effective blackout properties and easy-to-use adjustable louvres make this a fantastically practical choice, without compromising on looks. Make a feature of the crimson by setting it against dazzling white walls and dark furniture, although most tones of wood will work well with this blind.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Sky - Vertical Blind
products.description: The functional style of the origin (blackout) in sky gives you the best of both worlds when it comes to taste, class, and workability. The soft, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and is formed into slim louvres that are easy to move and tilt as you please. The traditional room for a blue might be the bathroom, but why not team the sky with yellows and whites in the dining room instead? Or grouping together with paler shades of blue in the guest bedroom or home office? With the versatility of the sky, the possibilities are infinite.

products.title: Kolsva, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality and style, the kolsva sheesham contains superior, basswood timber sustainably sourced from conservational forests. The quality crafted louvres, in a sophisticated walnut shade, sit on adjustable mechanisms that allow you to alter the angle of the blind for all of your privacy, ventilation, and shading preferences. Create an elegant dcor scheme in your lounge by resting the sheesham against lavishly textured wallpaper with cocoa hues and delicate detailing.

products.title: Kolsva, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Adorn your windows in superior, basswood timber with the kolsva wengi, using sustainably sourced wood from conservational forests. Featuring craftsman-built louvres and modern components to allow you to regulate the room with your shading and privacy likings, this stylish window dressing provides character and vogue. Use the deep shade of the wengi to create a compelling scheme in your lounge, with similarly toned wooden features and a contrasting ivory and burgundy palette.

products.title: Kolsva, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an elegant window covering with value, choose the kolsva tawny oak with its high quality standard and sustainably sourced timber. The authentic louvres and modern components allow you to create a sophisticated style, with the added practicality of ventilation and shading flexibilities. Fashion a vibrant and inspired tribal theme in your lounge by hanging the tawny oak against a burnt orange backing, with opposing cream.

products.title: Kolsva, Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you prefer an authentic window dressing with traditional style and practicality, choose the kolsva sycamore for its sustainably sourced timber and quality standard. Presenting naturally toned basswood louvres, that are quick and easy to install, with modern components, it allows you to adapt it to your privacy and shading preferences. For an elegant dcor scheme with a restful feel, use the sycamore in your bathroom to take advantage of its anti-cracking and anti-warping quality.

products.title: Kolsva, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kolsva pale oak brings a touch of the natural world inside your home in a truly timeless way. With the gentle ebb and flow of the grain set against a warm and cosy shade you'll be able to sit back and relax as you appreciate the finer things in life. Turning the guest bedroom into the home away from home that your guests will never want to leave is all about adding those homely touches that put them at ease.

products.title: Cotswold, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep cream of the capri (blackout) code serves to provide a shimmering neutral backdrop to other, more attention-grabbing dcor. Its gentle, wispy curves are barely visible, catching you by surprise as the light hits them. This pretty pale beige will work well in any room of the house, due to its fantastic flexibility. Try it in the kitchen, where its wipe-clean surface will come in handy, and blend with mocha browns, dusky blues, or stark whites, depending on the mood you're looking for.

products.title: Affinity, Plaster - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's plaster is warm and welcoming, and creates a homely, classic feel in any room, whilst maintaining a feeling of contemporary, modern-day style. Its louvre's tilting mechanism is simple and easy to use, so that can let light in or keep it out as you see fit. The plaster will sit pretty amidst dark browns and medium woods, whether in the living room, bedroom, hallway, or anywhere else you would like a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Burgundy - Vertical Blind
products.description: The gorgeously rich hue of the palermo (blackout) in burgundy adds a boldness to a room without compromising on classic, traditional style. Allow the light in whilst maintaining an element of privacy by gently tilting the adjustable louvres to your liking. Make the burgundy stand out in the living room by placing it against white or cream walls, and using matching burgundy accents throughout the room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerulean - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pretty duskiness of the palermo (blackout) in cerulean is a shade of blue that isn't to be missed, and when combined with the smooth, textured practicality of its lightly textured fabric, this blind becomes simply irresistible. Settle the cerulean amongst pale greys and whites, for a clean and attractive look in the kitchen, dining room, or living room. Accent with silver picture frames and ornaments, and don't forget to match your fixtures and fittings for maximum impact - you certainly won't regret the extra effort.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Chiffon - Vertical Blind
products.description: The capri (blackout) in chiffon offers a rich cream backdrop to delicately glistening curves, all on a durable, wipe-clean purposes, for when practicality is just as important as looks. Adjust the louvres for flexible light control, or draw back altogether as required. Use the chiffon in the kitchen amongst soft cappuccinos and pretty creams, or hang in the home office where you can pair with duck egg blues and cream soft furnishings, for a relaxing work environment that you won't want to leave.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Rocket - Vertical Blind
products.description: A deep brick red hue and discreet raised patterning come together in the sarra (blackout) rocket to create a modern and stylish blackout blind. Loud and proud, this is a powerful blackout blind that sets itself apart from its surrounding dcor. Sit the rocket amongst bright whites to create an unusual and eye-catching colour scheme in the bathroom, or use in a child's bedroom or playroom to add fun and colour to the mix.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Whisper - Vertical Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white rapture (blackout) in whisper blends a soft, subtle background with a gently shimmering pattern that sits naturally over the top. Adjust how much light enters your room by controlling the louvres to your liking, and never be left in the dark - or light - again. A neat addition to a light-coloured utility room or downstairs cloakroom, where space enhancement is a must, the whisper will hang perfectly in your window.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Cream coloured, with a gently textured satin finish, the palermo (blackout) cameo is a neutral blind that will fit almost anywhere in your home. Adjustable louvres are used to control the light, which will bounce off the blind's gentle sheen and reflect into your room. Go for gold in the living room by teaming the cameo with brushed gold metallics and soft cappuccino shades, resulting in calming, luxurious atmosphere that neither you and your family nor your guests will be able to resist.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Icecap - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sarra (blackout)'s icecap is a pure white, finely textured blind, with excellent blackout properties, so that you can keep the light and heat out as and when you need to. The brightness of the white offers a stark contrast to almost any shade, adding a refreshing cleanness wherever it's hung. For a crisp, clean home office, pair the icecap with bright limes and yellows to create a lively, eye-catching colour scheme, or with pale pastel blues or pinks for a calming serenity that's sure to help you concentrate.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Midnight - Vertical Blind
products.description: It's all in the name; the palermo (blackout) in midnight is a deep, night-time blue that provides a dark, mysterious atmosphere. The adjustable louvres can be moved or tilted to allow light in without compromising entirely on privacy. The kids will love this the midnight as a dark backdrop to a bedroom filled with glow-in-the dark stars and space-themed wallpaper, but the grown-ups will appreciate it just as much in a navy, white, and red kitchen or dining room, complemented by silvers or golds.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Sky - Vertical Blind
products.description: The gorgeously bold hue of the palermo (blackout) sky can't be missed, and you'll love the cheerful splash of colour that it brings to your home. Don't worry though, you can still see the outside sky whenever you like, by simply adjusting the louvres to tilt them or move them aside. Team the sky with bright white walls for a fresh, clean, and energetic feel in the family bathroom, or perhaps use in the playroom to match colourful wallpapers and fun fabrics.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Gossip - Vertical Blind
products.description: Bright, cheery, and uplifting, the sarra (blackout) gossip is a lively apple green fabric, with raised texturing to add depth and catch the eye. The gossip is an effective blackout blind, using the most up-to-date technology, and has a high quality, glistening finish. Go for a fruity colour scheme to liven up an all-white bathroom, by combining the gossip with hints of orange and lemon, to give an uplifting zest during your morning routine.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a modest look with soothing shade, choose the roma (fr) in beige, which hosts a calming oatmeal hue on a crisp and contemporary cloth. The modern style and adjustable slats of the blind allow you to create a chic display that lets you control the amount of light and air entering the room. Match the beige with harmonising walls in a sumptuous biscuit shade, adding a deeper taupe to accent the tone of the blind and for an assortment of similar hues.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Almond - Vertical Blind
products.description: The nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic one, and the louvres are easily adjusted to allow you more or less light or privacy. Feeling bold? Hang the almond against a bold, tropical purple feature wall in the dining room, where it will provide a necessary break to a bold, albeit beautiful, shade.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Dark Blue - Vertical Blind
products.description: Almost navy, the dark blue from the roma (fr) range is a flame-retardant blind with heaps of style and bags of practicality. The deep blue hue is oceanic and attractive, sitting sleekly on a smooth, lightweight fabric with a high quality and durable design. Makeover your dining room by combining the dark blue with pale greys and pure whites. The resulting look will be strong and bold, yet with an air of class and sophistication.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tempered neutrality of the deanna mist brings a cool, traditional feel to whichever window it's used in. This off-white blind is made from a long-lasting, quality fabric that hangs neatly as easily manoeuvrable louvres that you can adjust according to your light and privacy needs. The mist will add a cool look to warmer, bolder colours, such as burgundy in the dining room, plum in the living room, or chocolate in the kitchen.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Vertical Blind
products.description: Gentle by name, gentle by nature, this cream offering from the tiffany range is soft in texture but hardy in quality; yet despite its light hue, offers character and intrigue using a curved, wispy pattern that covers the length of the fabric. Use as part of a brown colour scheme in the living room, by placing against cappuccino walls and dark chocolate soft furnishings. Or why not add a touch of sophistication to a family den, home office, or dining room? With the gentle, endless possibilities await.

products.title: Deanna, Latte - Vertical Blind
products.description: Soft and neutral, with a curved twist pattern to add depth and interest, the deanna in latte will add subtle class to any home. This warm filter blind is a pretty taupe fabric with a high quality finish, and its easy-to-use tilting mechanism makes it long-lasting and durable. A neutral colour scheme in the home office can feel relaxing and tranquil, a feeling many of us need in order to be able to work effectively.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind brings class and sophistication wherever it goes. Use amidst dark chocolate and soft mocha browns in your living or dining room, or give a rustic kitchen a classy, modern twist. The soft cream will look especially stylish when coupled with taupe walls and dark woods.

products.title: Deanna, Cool Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sweet and subtle, the deanna in cool grey is a pleasure to behold, with its soft, silvery hue and gently curved patterning, which adds a little depth to an otherwise simple blind. Paired with the right colour scheme and dcor choices, this filter blind can look simply stunning in your home. Team the cool grey with blacks and whites to maintain a contemporary, monochrome colour scheme, offset by hints of silver in the form of ornaments and frames.

products.title: Tiffany, Imagine - Vertical Blind
products.description: A cool, pale shade of cream, the tiffany in imagine displays a wispy, curved pattern that will catch the eye at the same time as the light. The smooth, quality fabric, and gently raised stitching, is fine yet resilient, and hangs neatly in well-ordered louvres. Use in a kitchen amongst sunny yellows or cool blues, or add some life to your home office window without adding too much colour. Alternatively, the imagine will add class to a guest bedroom window, paired with soft pastel colours.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Ebony - Vertical Blind
products.description: Go bold with the roma (fr) in ebony for a dramatic window display that's certain to grab your visitors' attention. This contemporary black blind features a crisp and considerable fabric which forms a modern look with striking effect, and provides the added bonus of tilting louvres for your shading and privacy needs. Fashion a striking dcor scheme in your lounge by featuring the ebony amidst punchy fuschia walls and polished, ebony furniture.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Snow - Vertical Blind
products.description: From the safety conscious roma (fr) collection, the snow is a flame retardant blind, making it the perfect pick for a commercial property. Its practicality doesn't end there though, as the tilted vertical slats can be adjusted to suit your desired light, privacy, and ventilation. The snow will provide the ideal accent to a bold and bright colour scheme in a home office, where a sense of life and energy is all-important.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in illusion is a light, agile fabric in a candy pink colour, making it both striking in appearance and easily usable. Gently tilt the louvres to allow the light to pour through, or close again to keep it out - whichever you choose, it will be quick and easy to do. Hang the illusion in a vintage-style kitchen, accented by off-white walls and shabby chic furniture. Decorate with old retro advert posters in complementary colours, and you'll have the most fashionable kitchen around.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in chambray is a bright and brave hue that will keep out light disturbances whilst adding an attractive feature piece to your room. The smooth texture of the quality fabric used is perfect for its moveable louvres, which can be tilted at ease. This contemporary blue shade will add a splash of colour to an otherwise neutral bathroom or kitchen, making for a cool, calm, and collected environment.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Amour - Vertical Blind
products.description: A delicate pale pink and a sprightly, light fabric come together here to form the origin (blackout) in amour, a romantic and pretty vertical blind. The lightweight louvres can be moved across and tilted to suit your needs, and are durable and long-lasting in quality. The amour will create an ethereal, romantic vibe when paired with dainty country florals in a bedroom, and is best complemented by creams and whites, along with stronger pink shades.

products.title: Faux Silk, Silver - Roman Blind
products.description: It doesn't get more glamorous than the faux silk silver, with its ebony shading and satin-smooth fabric. Raised stitching flecks the cloth, adding texture and flair to this sophisticated roman blind. The silver will hang almost anywhere in the home, whether amongst white walls with mid-grey and silver highlights for a monochromatic scheme in the dining room, with zesty citrus shades for a bright and energising look in the kitchen, or amid pale pastels to add a modern but calming touch to a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Blackout Roller, Liquorice (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Blackout Roller, Flame (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Blackout Roller, Cocoa (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Blackout Roller, Biscotti (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Capella, Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Words, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The words spring is a white blind with grey and soft purple letters sprinkled over the top. A lightweight and high quality fabric allows the light to filter through, creating a sunny, cheery vibe in any room. Use the spring in the home office to reflect a business mind, and accentuate with dove grey walls, white furniture, and lilac stationery, which will lead to a cool, contemporary look that doesn't take itself too seriously.

products.title: Words, Summer - Roller Blind
products.description: The fun, alphabet sprinkled words summer is a bold, funky choice for your home, and you'll find yourself absentmindedly creating words from nowhere. The bright lime and vivid yellow are tempered by the subtle dove grey, and placed on an off-white background fabric that allows light to filter through at will. Use the summer in a family dining room to add fun and games to dinnertime, or hang in a child's bedroom to get them learning the alphabet without even thinking about it.

products.title: Words, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Words in autumn is all about fun and games, with its scattered alphabet and bright, fruity orange tones. This light-filtering blind is made from quality, lightweight white fabric, and controlled by an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Add a vivid splash of colour to the kitchen, and accent it with oranges and greys all around. Or instead, settle amongst plain wallpaper in the kids' bedroom and match with funky colours to create a bold, fun look that will have them sure to go up to bed on time.

products.title: Anthology, Fire Brick - Roller Blind
products.description: Fire brick is the latest addition to their new anthology collection, and it's a design that is sure to live long in the memory. This isn't a fabric that glistens and sparkles, and yet it still manages to catch your eye from a variety of different angles. It's the subtle way in which the flecks of white break up the surface that do it. If you want to create a modern look that will stand the test of time, what better place for fire brick than the kitchen? You can match your tiles and flooring to the red brick shade which then leaves you with plenty of space for a secondary colour on your units and worktops.

products.title: Anthology, Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology fired earth is a rich symphony of terracotta reds and calming whites that catches your eye the moment you walk in the room. The intricacy is what brings the fabric to life, and it's what will enable you to weave in half a dozen matching textures without crowding your space. We love the idea of using fired earth in the kitchen alongside some matching tiling and worktops. You could then paint the units a light graphite grey for a natural colour match you won't see anywhere else.

products.title: Anthology, Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Snow mountain provides a crisp white with a subtle hint of blue -perfect for injecting something a little unexpected into the mix. As you look closer you come to see that it's the quality of the weave that defines the fabric, and that it's just the level of detail you need to provide your interiors with new depth and clarity. Combine the blue undertone of snow mountain with a crisp apple green to create a light and vibrant space that doesn't overwhelm the senses.

products.title: Apollo, Endeavour - Roller Blind
products.description: The apollo in endeavour is as creamy as cream can be, making this the ideal choice for keeping a room looking light and airy, even when shut. The textured fabric of the apollo range adds some character to an otherwise neutral shade, adding depth to the lightweight material. The endeavour will pair wonderfully with browns and beiges for a confident contrasting look in a dining room or living room.

products.title: Capella, Atlantic Mystic - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in atlantic mystic you come to see just how much work has gone into creating the delicate silver patterning. The way in which the artisan silver threads shimmer underneath the light gives the florals a life of their own. One which you get to celebrate every time you look at your new roller blinds. Taking a chance and being bold with your colours is what mystic allows you to do. The silver and blue work wonders when set against a matching red.

products.title: Delicia, Aquamarine - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at delicia aquamarine you will see the relaxed cream background contrasting with the vibrant electric blue petals. This allows you to see two different sides of the colour spectrum at the same time, and to understand that they can harmonise in unexpected ways. Embrace the vitality of the blue by matching it with a crisp apple green. This will enable you to breathe new life into any space, and to do it in a way that introduces plenty of natural colour and vitality.

products.title: Kindling, Chiffon - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you that love neutral tones topped off with show stopping elegance we give you kindling chiffon. The neutral fabric is intricate, fine, and light. But it's the free-flowing silver curves that bring chiffon into its own. They drift casually down the fabric, taking their time and giving you plenty of opportunity to take them all in. Chiffon sits gently in the background adding the sparkle and finishing touch to any room.
